QuestData.Title: Odds and Ends
QuestData.Description:
Master Ashton's going to probably need something bracing once we get him free. I know of a quick potion guaranteed to get anyone to snap out of it, but I'm going to need a few things first.
Those wicker dogs down there have some organic parts I can use and the witches are carrying bags of reagents. They'll almost certainly have what I need.
Bring those to me and I'll handle the rest once we get Master Ashton back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Organic Matter Samples and $2oa Bags of Reagents.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... Very interesting. And pungent. Perhaps my first order of business will be something to remove the smell.
